item.description:
From: 22-04-2024 12:00
To: 13-05-2024 13:00
Category: Assegni di ricerca

Requisiti richiesti ai candidati:

- possesso di titolo di studio come indicato dal bando;

- possesso di un curriculum scientifico professionale idoneo allo svolgimento di attività di ricerca.


 


BANDO per il conferimento di n. 19 assegni per la collaborazione ad attività di ricerca presso i Dipartimenti di:

item.title: University of Turin Visiting Professor Program - Call for applicants (a.y . 2024 - 2025)
item.description:
From: 08-04-2024 11:00
To: 08-05-2024 11:00
Category: Visiting Professor

Before filling in the application form, please check the Visiting Professor webpage and read carefully the selection announcement in order to verify the eligibility criteria and the documents to be submitted, and the List of Courses in order to choose the positions you would like to apply for. 


Please remember that each candidate may apply for a maximum of two positions, and that each selected visiting professor may only accept one assignment per academic year.
